org.dgfoundation.amp.newreports

Interface ReportSpecification

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReportSpecificationImpl

    public interface ReportSpecification
extends java.lang.Cloneable
    this defines a report specification, e.g. the requested structure of a report. An instance of this class defines univoquely the kind of report to be generated: columns, hierarchies, filters, sorting

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      the names should NOT be localized
      ReportFilters getFilters() 
      GroupingCriteria getGroupingCriteria() 
      java.util.Set<ReportColumn> getHierarchies()

      default java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getHierarchyNames()
      these are the simple names of the hierarchies getHierarchies()
      java.util.Set<ReportColumn> getInvisibleHierarchies()
      List of hierarchies that must be added before executing the report and then removed from output.

      default ReportCollapsingStrategy getSubreportsCollapsing()
      whether to collapse same-named hierarchies with different IDs
      boolean isAlsoShowPledges()
      if the report type is different from ArConstants.PLEDGES_TYPE, this will lead to including the pledges which match the filter into the report

      boolean isDisplayEmptyFundingRows()

      boolean isShowOriginalCurrency()
      whether to show original currencies of transactions
      boolean isSummaryReport()
      whether to collapse the CRDs to trail cells only when displaying

      • getReportType

        int getReportType()

        Returns:

      • getReportName

        java.lang.String getReportName()
        the name of the report localized
        Returns:

      • getColumns

        java.util.Set<ReportColumn> getColumns()
        the names should NOT be localized
        Returns:
        the set of columns to use. The order of iteration of the set is meaningful - so please either use a @link LinkedHashSet or a @link SortedSet

      • getMeasures

        java.util.Set<ReportMeasure> getMeasures()
        Returns:
        the set of measures to use. The order of iteration of the set is meaningful - so please either use a @link LinkedHashSet or a @link SortedSet

      • getHierarchies

        java.util.Set<ReportColumn> getHierarchies()
        this set should be a strict subset of the one returned at getColumns()
        Returns:

      • getInvisibleHierarchies

        java.util.Set<ReportColumn> getInvisibleHierarchies()
        List of hierarchies that must be added before executing the report and then removed from output.

        Returns:
        whether columns with no funding data should be displayed or not

      • isDisplayEmptyFundingRows

        boolean isDisplayEmptyFundingRows()
        Returns:
        whether rows with no funding data should be displayed or not

      • isDisplayEmptyFundingRowsWhenFilteringByTransactionHierarchy

        boolean isDisplayEmptyFundingRowsWhenFilteringByTransactionHierarchy()
        Returns:
        whether rows with no funding data should be displayed when filtering by transaction hierarchy

      • isEmptyOutputForUnspecifiedData

        boolean isEmptyOutputForUnspecifiedData()
        Returns:
        whether textual cells with no data should display "" (if true) or "[columnName] unspecified" (if false)

      • isPopulateReportHeadersIfEmpty

        boolean isPopulateReportHeadersIfEmpty()
        If the report query returns empty response the list of column headers is populated from the request
        Returns:

      • isAlsoShowPledges

        boolean isAlsoShowPledges()
        if the report type is different from ArConstants.PLEDGES_TYPE, this will lead to including the pledges which match the filter into the report
        Returns:
